about_the_game:
Prism Plus Video File Converter is a ultra-fast, easy-to-use video converter for Windows. Whether you are looking to convert avi to mp4, avi to mov, or vob to wmv, Prism gives you the flexibility to convert both the popular and hard to find file formats. Prism converts in three easy steps. Simply choose the files you wish to convert, select the output folder and file format you desire and click Convert!

Some Prism Features Include:
  • Drag and drop video files directly into the Prism interface for convenience.
  • Extract video directly from DVDs.
  • Preview video files before conversion with the video previewer screen.
  • Add video effects, like text overlay.
  • Edit your videos before conversion by correcting its orientation.
  • Include a watermark for to protect your video.
  • Adjust video settings, such as compression/encoder rates, resolution and frame rates.
  • Customize file sizes of various output files.
  • Use batch conversion to apply effects and settings and convert all at one time to specified files.

Some File Formats Include: .3gp, .asf, .avi, .divx, .dv, .flv, .m4v, .mkv, .mod, .mov, .mp4, .mpe, .mpeg, .mpg, .ogv, .vob, .webm, .wmv and many more.
detailed_description:
Prism Plus Video File Converter is a ultra-fast, easy-to-use video converter for Windows. Whether you are looking to convert avi to mp4, avi to mov, or vob to wmv, Prism gives you the flexibility to convert both the popular and hard to find file formats. Prism converts in three easy steps. Simply choose the files you wish to convert, select the output folder and file format you desire and click Convert!

Some Prism Features Include:
  • Drag and drop video files directly into the Prism interface for convenience.
  • Extract video directly from DVDs.
  • Preview video files before conversion with the video previewer screen.
  • Add video effects, like text overlay.
  • Edit your videos before conversion by correcting its orientation.
  • Include a watermark for to protect your video.
  • Adjust video settings, such as compression/encoder rates, resolution and frame rates.
  • Customize file sizes of various output files.
  • Use batch conversion to apply effects and settings and convert all at one time to specified files.

Some File Formats Include: .3gp, .asf, .avi, .divx, .dv, .flv, .m4v, .mkv, .mod, .mov, .mp4, .mpe, .mpeg, .mpg, .ogv, .vob, .webm, .wmv and many more.

name: Prism

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, XP, Vista, 7, 8 and 8.1
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Prism is designed to be usable with minimal resources.

reviews:
“Prism Video Converter is one of my favorite programs from NCH. It is extremely easy to use. I recently went through my library of home movies and other videos that I had in digital format. Some of these videos were up to 15 years old and I couldn't play them properly on my modern electronics. Prism allows me to take just about any format and convert it to whatever I want. It also heightens the quality of the playback without bloating the file size of the project.”
5.0 – Amazon
short_description: Prism is a video file converter for Windows. It can convert many different types of video files, like mp4, avi, wmv, vob, mkv, mpeg and many more. Prism Video Converter is lightning-fast and easy-to-use. Edit, adjust videos within Prism, and choose from a wide variety of output settings.
